name: ApproachingStormSoundsforSleepandRelaxation
0:
”Alexa, open Approaching storm”
”Alexa, start Approaching storm”
”Alexa, launch Approaching storm”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: approaching storm
des:
Let the Approaching Storm sounds clear your mind and take you to a quiet place of reflection.

"Approaching Storm Sounds for Sleep and Relaxation" plays calming sound loops to help you fall asleep faster, sleep better, relax, meditate, or drown out distracting noises.

The vibrations and frequencies of these powerful sounds have shown tremendous healing properties. Just relax and feel the activation of different brain centers as you go deeper with sleep sound.


*** HOW TO USE ***

Enable Approaching Storm Sounds by clicking the "enable" button above, then say "Alexa, launch Approaching Storm".
By default, Alexa will play Approaching Storm Sounds. To pause ambient sound, say "Alexa, pause.” To resume it again, say "Alexa, resume."


*** PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP FEATURES ***

+ 100% increase in audio quality
+ Play different ambient sounds without any time limit 
+ Switch between ambient sounds using 'Next' and 'Previous' commands 


*** REVIEWS AND FEEDBACK ***

Your reviews and feedback are important to us! If you love our skill, please consider showing your support by writing your valuable feedback.

Note: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
